author: CBC News
title: Mask mandate ends in Saskatchewan Monday | CBC News
description: For the second time in Saskatchewan’s COVID-19 history the province is dropping all its COVID-19 public health orders, including the requirement to wear a mask.
content:
For the second time in Saskatchewan's COVID-19 history the province is dropping its COVID-19 health restrictions, including the requirement to wear a mask.
